retValues: Actual time since the first call to PxTickDefine_Hnd in milliseconds
0, if the ticks per second are not (yet) set

description.short: Return the actual time since the first call to PxTickDefine_Hnd in milliseconds

long.text: PxTickGetTimeInMilliSeconds returns the actual time since the first call to PxTickDefine_Hnd in milliseconds.
